title: Eternal change: story of a mountain
brief_description: Traces the origin of Mount Rainier from eruption through a rift in the surface and its development in subsequent volcanic action. Shows the cycle of the seasons, the erosion by wind and water, the action of snow and ice and the movement of the glaciers.
